Profile:

Operation, Project Planing & management, Plant Maintenance, Design of Single line diagrams,
LT - HT Panel Maintenance. I am now looking to develop in a challenging role within a dynamic
and progressive operation where enthusiasm, dedication and the ability to mange task effectively
are prerequisite in driving the organization forward in most modern way through my constant
learning of modern concepts.
